name: Race3D
description:
This is a remake of Race from the WIndows XR game, or rather a complete remake because one is bored to drive on an empty map and I decided to add bots and a couple more goodies like disabling AI, turbo and broken models because 3DRad has not eaten models from SketchUp 2022 and the project has been 2 weeks and I will develop if there are ideas I will do something or you can send me ideas on discord and by the way, the developer of the original game gave me ideas for Race3D and I also threw something at him (in fact, I just gave one name for a synonym of Microsoft- Nanosoft) The game also has a version with a top view and the earliest build

My discord: Fish3DRad#0001

Original game: https://gamejolt.com/games/windowsxr/723090

Or you can support me with a penny: https://www.donationalerts.com/r/b9k36

Have fun!
